Label: Overall absence: percentage
Description: Percentage of possible sessions recorded as an absence from school for whatever reason, whether authorised or unauthorised.

Label: Persistent absence: around 15% +
Description: The percentage of pupil enrolments missing around 15 per cent or more possible sessions over the full academic year. This equates to missing 56 or more sessions for pupils aged 5-14 and 46 or more sessions for those aged 15.
